derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French, from Italian parasole, from para- 'protecting against' + sole 'sun' (from Latin sol)

entry.def: A parasol is an object like an umbrella that provides shade from the sun.

means.word_mean: 1. a handheld collapsible source of shade
